Articles.Content:
Here's the Github where I uploaded the plugin

https://github.com/Watermel00n/LT_OrbitSpawner

Here's the KSP log:

https://github.com/Watermel00n/LT_OrbitSpawner/blob/main/KSP.log

What I did:

Launched a craft with the OrbitSpawner Part Module

Clicked the Test Spawner button

Message shown that the vessel is spawned (intended)

Kerbin disappears

Map view lines and icons stop showing

Can't go back to space center or revert without getting stuck at the loading screen
Can't see the log because its too big for github to show.  But have you tried used debug.log to log to the console to determine the line of code that's causing the error?
